name: Reactor (itch) (benjames171)
description:
Delve into the radiated remains of an exploded nuclear reactor and collect graphite fragments, solve puzzles and avoid hazards along your path.

Controls are included in the game. Additionally, pressing 'R' on the menu screen will reset game progress.

Note: this is a prototype so expect gameplay issues. Also, due to an engine bug, the game may occasionally freeze between levels. Sorry if this happens - you can restart the game and your progress will continue where you left off.

Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 125

Follow me on Twitter - @benjames171

Music by Eric Matyas - soundimage.org
